Literature.Title: Trp residues near peptide termini enhance the membranolytic activity of cationic amphipathic α-helices
Literature.Author: Strandberg E, Horten P, Bentz D, Wadhwani P, Bürck J, Ulrich AS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6±1% Hemolysis=128 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:19±7% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1116(MIC=4µg/ml),Franconibacter helveticus DSM 18390(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus xylosus DSM 20287(MIC=32µg/ml)
